title: Fix footer/loading image width to prevent cropping

requirements.summary: Update the Footer component's Nebacrypt logo banner image container and element to display the full image without cropping, ensuring appropriate width (w-full or sufficiently large fixed/max width) and no hidden overflow on the parent container.
acceptanceCriteria: The Nebacrypt logo banner image in the footer renders fully without any cropping on all sides.
The image container does not clip or hide overflow.
The image scales responsively and remains uncropped on common screen widths.

file_operations.description: Modify the img element and its parent container in the Footer component to ensure the Nebacrypt logo banner image displays fully without cropping. Remove any overflow-hidden classes from parent containers. Apply w-full or a sufficiently large max-width to the image element. Ensure the container allows the image to render at its full dimensions without clipping.
